main event: A white, round, pulsing object was observed at an altitude of about 1000 feet, approaching the observer during a 1-minute sighting.
interesting points: The object was about 200-300 yards in diameter., The object moved very fast and suddenly for about 15 minutes., It was observed for approximately 10 seconds during its approach., The sighting occurred in Morton Grove, Illinois., No sound was associated with the observed object.
